saves are bugged. They do not overwrite and do not tell you the time. Other than the fact that saving is fucked up the ass, this works. Good luck playing while saving in a new slot every time. If you save in an old slot it will load the first time it was saved ever.

Only been to the interrogation room so I cant say if going to be fine all the way.
Install size is 5.63 GB, the Movies folder have a lot of small loading screens and nothing big.
Not sure if there is suppose to be longer fmv or all cutscenes in the game are just pre-recorder but that is how it is on most Bethesda games.

update: I am 97% right on the saves. Autosaves seem fine but I am 97% sure overwriting saves does not work.. however after entering a new area it did overwrite the save with the new image.

Before it simply loaded the first time I saved the slot. So I am confused and maybe someone else can chime in or correct me on the problem.

Other than that THIS WORKS 100%
